duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain SAP configuration in the IMG and test and implement configuration changes.
Conduct ongoing SAP end-user training for new employees and employees changing roles.
Maintain SAP-related issue/resolution status and troubleshoot SAP system functionality problems.
Identify data inconsistencies, provide reports to users, and work with them to help resolve erroneous data within the system.
Submit OSS Notes to SAP and recommend the application of relevant SAP-provided OSS notes, patches, etc.
Evaluate, test, and implement SAP system software upgrades and write detailed specifications for enhancement requests requiring programming.
Provide analysis and recommendations to management to ensure the business system and associated processes are consistent with the general business direction.
Work with users to examine business process areas for improvement and develop project timelines to ensure target project dates are met.
Provide end-user support, analyze current SAP processes, identify problems, develop and recommend solutions.
Investigate opportunities for implementation of new functionality in SAP to achieve process improvement in the business and train organizational process owners on a train-the-trainer basis.
Prepare and maintain process flow diagrams for educational purposes, monitor and address help desk requests, and take the lead in the knowledge area for larger, long-term business system projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree and SAP FI/CO Certification highly preferred. (5+ Years of experience with at least 3 years of generalbusiness process evaluation. Experience contributing to at least one SAP implementation. Or, experience working with ECC and S/4 Hana. At least one year of experience in setting up IMG (Implementation Guide) configurations in SAP. Additional SAP experience outside of FI/CO is a bonus.)
